title: [Update: Fixed] Some Google Pixel phones can’t make contactless payments after March patch
content:
After installing the Android 12L March Feature Drop and security patch, some Pixel devices have become uncertified and can no longer make contactless (NFC) transactions with Google Pay.

more…

The post [Update: Fixed] Some Google Pixel phones can’t make contactless payments after March patch appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: After the Android 12L March update, some Pixel (3a–5a) owners can't make contactless transactions with Google Pay because of uncertified ...
